name: Fusion Alliance
mission: A Voice for the Innocent is a non-profit community dedicated to the support of those affected by rape and sexual abuse. We are a safe and compassionate space to come forward about your story and we use music and technology to provide access to long term resources.

summary.text: Careful development and maintenance of the front end of Eli Lilly’s Direct to Consumer and Health Care Provider product websites while working with multiple creative agencies, project owners and legal reviewers.

Use of web technologies including version control (Git), package managers (NPM, Yarn), task automation (Webpack, Gulp), CSS preprocessors (SASS), templating engines (Handlebars) and use of Javascript frameworks (React, Vue).
Contributing to other projects which include email development (Custom Foundation builds) and marketing banners (Google Web Designer).
